pageContext.patina: light grey or greenish & a few spots of blue. Loop portion (on side) is covered with,pale olive green patina.
pageContext.surface: smooth. Traces of light earth or clay.
pageContext.associations: One of a Bronze Founder's Hoard of 16 Socketed Celts, 20 Lumps of Rough Metal, 14 Pieces of Socketed,celts, 14 small pieces of an earthenware pot. 4 Pieces of Rim of Burial urn, a pair of Burial Urn,Handles. 3 spearheads, 1 chape & part of a socketed tool.
pageContext.publications: Trans. Essex Arch. Soc. N.S. vi, 172
pageContext.collection: Colchester Museum (515-94),,  presented to Essex Arch Soc. by Lord Rockwood 1894,(trans. Essex Arch. Soc. NS VI, 172)
pageContext.toSearch: Hatfield Broad Oak, Bishop's Stortford, Essex Cm22, UK
